title: Film Information
description: After creating an instance of `HdRezkaApi`, you can access various properties of the film.

items.title: Film
items.code:
from HdRezkaApi import HdRezkaApi

url = 'https://hdrezka.ag/films/thriller/471-illyuziya-obmana-2013-latest.html'
rezka = HdRezkaApi(url)

print('id:', rezka.id)
print('name:', rezka.name)
print('description:', rezka.description)
print('thumbnail:', rezka.thumbnail)
print('thumbnailHQ:', rezka.thumbnailHQ)
print('type:', rezka.type)
print('category:', rezka.category)
print('rating:', rezka.rating)
print('translators:', rezka.translators)
print('translators_names:', rezka.translators_names)
print('otherParts:', rezka.otherParts)

items.title: Series
items.code:
from HdRezkaApi import HdRezkaApi

url = 'https://hdrezka.ag/series/thriller/47-sherlok-2010.html'
rezka = HdRezkaApi(url)

print('id:', rezka.id)
print('name:', rezka.name)
print('description:', rezka.description)
print('thumbnail:', rezka.thumbnail)
print('thumbnailHQ:', rezka.thumbnailHQ)
print('type:', rezka.type)
print('category:', rezka.category)
print('rating:', rezka.rating)
print('translators:', rezka.translators)
print('translators_names:', rezka.translators_names)
print('seriesInfo:', rezka.seriesInfo)
print('episodesInfo:', rezka.episodesInfo)
